summary: Here comes the Redguard Champion. Here comes a badass dragon slayer.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/912x709q90/538/GYwqwA.png[/img]

[img]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1319x67q90/537/5lqKlg.png[/img]


[center][font=Tahoma][size=4][b]Here comes the Redguard Champion. Here comes a badass dragon slayer.
[/b][/size][/font]

[font=Tahoma][size=3]Here is Namasur at-Hamishan, also called ''Namasur the Ash-abah''. After being the Redguard Champion of the Arena, he now want to come in Skyrim to join the famous Companions. But he don't really know what this Nordic land has for him...[/size]

[size=3]After crossing the border unlawfully, the Imperials caught him. He was sentenced to death, taking him for a Stormcloak spy.[/size]


[size=4][b]This is where your journey begins...[/b][/size]



[/font][/center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img538/8549/V88xJ3.png[/img]


[center][font=Tahoma][size=3]You need the lastest Skyrim version (1.9.0.32)[/size][/font][/center][center][font=Tahoma][size=3]You also have to download these awesome mods to get the same results as seen in the screenshots.[/size][/font]
[font=Tahoma][color=#f1c232][size=3][b]All the credits go their respective authors.[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[font=Tahoma][size=3]I've only made the character itself. So here we go : 


[/size][/font][/center][list][*][font=Tahoma][size=3][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]Skyrim Script Extender 1.7.1 (SKSE)[/url] [/size][i][size=2]by Ian Patterson, Stephen Abel and Paul Connelly[/size][/i][/font][/*]
[*][font=Tahoma][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url] [/size][/font][font=Tahoma][size=2][i]by Expired[/i][/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Tahoma][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?]Beards[/url] [/size][/font][font=Tahoma][size=2][i]by Hvergelmir[/i][/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Tahoma][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url] [/size][i][size=2]by Hvergelmir[/size][/i][/font][/*]
[*][font=Tahoma][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11140/?]Bald Head [/url][/size][size=2]by dark1402[/size][/font][/*]
[/list][font=Tahoma][size=2]
[/size][/font][font=Tahoma][size=3]
[/size] [size=3]The following mods are optionals, but [b][color=#cc0000]highly recommended[/color][/b] :

[/size][list][*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2356/?]XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement[/url] [/size][size=2][i]by Xenius   [/i][b][color=#f1c232]The normalmaps comes from this mod[/color][/b][/size][/*]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13076/?]Cute Eyes[/url] [/size][size=2][i]by tktk[/i][/size][/*]
[/list][size=2][i]



[/i][/size][img]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1319x67q90/633/OHbF0w.png[/img][/font]


[center][color=#f1c232][size=3][b]Manual install only
[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]Simple : Drag / drop the file in your ''saves'' folder

(C:\Users\YourName\Documents\My Games\Skyrim\Saves)[/size][/center][size=3]



[/size][font=Tahoma][img]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1319x67q90/633/f1Bo7J.png[/img][/font]


[center][font=Tahoma][size=3]Namasur is a novice in terms of killing dragons, so he's level 1.[/size][/font]

[size=3][b][color=#f1c232]This is a new game![/color][/b]
[color=#f1c232][b]You'll start from beginning, before the first dungeon.[/b][/color][/size]

[font=Tahoma][size=3]Feel free to change whatever you want (name, haircuts, etc).[/size][/font]
[font=Tahoma][size=3]To do that, simply open the console with the '' [/size][size=4]~[/size][/font][font=Georgia] [size=4]''[/size][/font][font=Tahoma] [size=3]button and type[/size] [/font][i][size=4]showracemenu[/size][size=3].[/size][/i][/center]



[font=Tahoma][img]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1319x67q90/661/xTw1Mo.png[/img][/font]


[center][font=Tahoma][size=3]Bethesda for making Skyrim
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2950481/?]expired6978[/url] for the awesome RaceMenu mod
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/30027/?]lthot[/url] for Beards and Brows
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/726673/?]Xenius[/url] for his great textures
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3841389/?]tktk1[/url] for the beautiful Cute Eyes mod
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/493649/?]dark1402[/url] for the essential Bald Head

The Nexus Community for all the work and support[/size][/font]   



   [/center]
author: JackHerer93
